title: Ticket #1733: run_nightly_builds needs to distinguish logs.
description:
run_nightly_builds is run multiple times in the crontab on nmi-s006 for various buildsets. However, it only writes one log and ultimately overwrites previous incarnations for each build. We want to keep the behavior where it overwrites a log file, but we want to change the log file it uses. Adding a command line argument to enable this feature would solve it.

I'm adding one.
remarks:
2010-Oct-25 14:15:29 by psilord:
I fixed the run_nightly_build script to accept a logfile argument. I fixed the crontab for the nightlies which runs that script to use it. And then I fixed the wiki page which describes it so people know how it works.

I also cleaned out some old build system crap from the crontab that we haven't used in many, many months.

2010-Oct-25 14:15:58 by psilord:
This ticket is resolved.
